#summary Create or update an inventory folder.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||request_method||AddInventoryFolder||String||Yes||
||id||UUID of the folder to create or update||UUID||Optional||
||parent_id||The Parent folder UUID||UUID||Yes||
||owner_id||UUID of the folder owner||UUID||Yes||
||name||Folder name||String||Yes||
||content_type||Preferred content type for this folder. Defaults to application/octet-stream||ContentType||Optional||

  * ID is only required for updating an existing folder

{{{
request_method=AddInventoryFolder
&parent_id=40f36b6d-d239-4ade-b354-f0f5cb9ce8f8
&owner_id=8e21c2df-32b2-472c-b09b-88b909ba4c86
&name=Default+Appearance
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||folder_id||UUID of the created or updated folder||UUID||

Success:

{{{
{
    "success":"true",
    "folder_id":"2cf49939-b9f0-45af-ad21-b3441de85f52"
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "success":"false",
    "message":"Invalid OwnerID"
}
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * A success or failure response was returned
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred
